**Add user authentication (signup & login)**

Description
-----------
Implement user authentication flows: signup, login, logout, and password hashing. Protect routes that require an authenticated user.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- Add user registration and login endpoints.
- Passwords stored securely (hashed with a recommended algorithm).
- Session or token-based authentication for protected routes.
- Update frontend to include signup/login pages or minimal forms to exercise the flows.

Labels: backend, auth, enhancement
Estimate: medium
